mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.author_email, a.id AS author_id, a.username AS author_username, pr.profile_image_url AS author_profile_image_url, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.likes FROM posts p JOIN accounts a ON a.email = p.author_email LEFT JOIN profiles pr ON pr.email = p.author_email WHERE p.id = #{postId}

SELECT p.id, p.author_email, a.id AS author_id, a.username AS author_username, pr.profile_image_url AS author_profile_image_url, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.likes FROM posts p JOIN accounts a ON a.email = p.author_email LEFT JOIN profiles pr ON pr.email = p.author_email ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
